name: Neon (itch) (Grant Hagaman)
description:
THIS GAME IS CURRENTLY IN DEVELOPMENT.

Neon is a simple but hard platforming game. With a simple but vibrant environment to set the neon mood, you will get addicted to the challenging platforming Neon has. The game currently has 2 of it's 5 planned levels completed with the 3rd in development currently.

Coming Soon:

  • Levels 3-5
  • Sound design
  • Music soundtrack
  • Overhauled particle system

Bugs:

As the game is still in development, there are a few current bugs in the game, but none are game breaking. Below is a list of most of the known bugs, if you find anymore please tell me in the comment section.

  • Hit not registering every once and a while on death and bounce platforms
  • Visual glitch when the player moves to fast
  • Re spawning in the wrong level. Just use the pause menu to get to the current level if this happens (it is rare)
  • If you die while in the pause menu, the game freezes
  • If you hit the side of a bounce pad you get launched super far (feature but some of you might consider it a bug)
  • Textures and/or assets not loading correctly
